summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable solutions and leading cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
duties: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ daily users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% faster response times

jobs.title: Software Engineer
duties: Developed React-based frontend applications with TypeScript
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
Collaborated with product team to define technical requirements
Implemented automated testing increasing code coverage to 85%

jobs.title: Junior Developer
duties: Created responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Worked with WordPress and custom PHP development
Assisted in client consultations and project planning
Maintained and updated existing client websites

education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from University of California, Berkeley (2019)
